title: Golden Globe Nominee 'Pride'
teaser: The film, which is based on a true story, tells of the unlikely alliance between British mine workers and LGBT activists in 1984.
contentencoded:
The Golden Globes are this coming Sunday. One of the nominees for Best Motion Picture-Musical or Comedy is “Pride.”

The film, which is based on a true story, tells the unlikely story of the how the bitter British miners strike of 1984 led to an unlikely alliance between the mine workers and activists from London’s gay and lesbian community.

We revisit our October conversation with “Pride” director Matthew Warchus and screenwriter Stephen Beresford.
